name: XVGBASE
description: XVGBASE is the native XVG token deployed on the Base network, part of the expanding XVG ecosystem spanning 12 EVM-compatible blockchains. Each token, including XVGBASE, shares a unified contract address, an innovation that ensures seamless cross-chain recognition and interoperability without the need for wrapped assets. XVGBASE represents a decentralized movement for borderless, interoperable utility across Ethereum L2 networks and beyond, fostering a truly unified DeFi experience.
